data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 344 believers in the state of Sakarya to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sakarya, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Sakarya to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Sakarya, Turkey to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Sakarya, Turkey into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Arab, Lebanese people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Sakarya to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Sakarya, Turkey.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 911,920, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

location.name: Sakarya
location.cities_list: Adapazarı, Karasu Mahallesi, Hendek, Karasu, Sapanca
location.cities_list_w_pop: Adapazarı (286,787), Karasu Mahallesi (39,508), Hendek (35,257), Karasu (30,746), Sapanca (25,224)
